function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in densely populated regions with significant social interactions.","Impact":"High rates of infection, overwhelmed healthcare systems, and significant loss of life.","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict public health measures, including social distancing, mask-wearing, and vaccination campaigns.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccination tracking systems, and air quality monitoring devices.","People":"Densely populated urban areas, social and community groups, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Government health departments, community leaders, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Long-term quarantine leading to detrimental effects on psychological health.","Impact":"Post-traumatic stress symptoms, confusion, anger, panic disorders, anxiety, depression, and other mental health issues.","Mitigation":"Implementation of mental health support services, access to therapy, and community engagement programs.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, and online support groups.","People":"Quarantined individuals, mental health professionals, and community support networks.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Increased activities in public and open spaces during the pandemic.","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of COVID-19 in public areas, despite the perceived mental and physical well-being benefits.","Mitigation":"Promotion of safe outdoor activities, education on public health guidelines, and access to testing and vaccination sites in open spaces.","Technologies":"Location-based COVID-19 exposure notification apps, outdoor ventilation monitoring systems, and open space crowd monitoring tools.","People":"General public, outdoor enthusiasts, and public health advocates.","Owner":"Local government authorities, public health agencies, and outdoor recreation organizations."}]}
